data.title: May 11, 2024 All That Jazz – A celebration of 10th Anniversary of Saint Louis Polonia
data.meta_description:
Join us to celebrate Saint Louis Polonia's 10th Anniversary of bringing Polish Arts, Culture, and "All that jazz" to the Saint Louis area.
Tickets are $25.00 payable at the door or the Eventbrite platform 
 
NOTE: Drinks are always free at THE CHAPEL - the premier venue
data.text:
Join us to celebrate Saint Louis Polonia’s 10th Anniversary of bringing Polish Arts, Culture, and “All that jazz” to the Saint Louis area.

Tickets are $25.00 payable at the door or the Eventbrite platform

NOTE: Drinks are always free at THE CHAPEL – the premier venue for the arts and music.

_________________________________

Works to be selected from the following.

Frédéric Chopin, 1810-1849

Prelude in E minor, Opus 28, #4 – from The Pianist, The Notebook, Fatal Attraction, Five Easy Pieces, and many more

Krzysztof Komeda, 1931-1969

Ballad for Bernt – from Knife In The Water

Zbigniew Preisner, 1955

Marionette #9 – from The Double Life of Veronique

Tomasz Stańko, 1942-2018

Farewell to Maria – from A Farwell to Maria

Bronisław Kaper, 1902-1983, & Paul Frances Webster, 1907-1984

Invitation – from A life of Her Own and Invitation

Follow Me – from Mutiny on the Bounty

Bronisław Kaper & Ned Washington, 1901-1976

On Green Dolphin Street – from Green Dolphin Street

Victor Young, 1900-1956, & Ned Washington

My Foolish Heart – from My Foolish Heart – with Ned Washington

Stella by Starlight – from The Uninvited – with Ned Washington

Victor Young & Edward Heyman, 1907-1981

When I Fall In Love – from One Minute to Zero

PERFORMERS

Paul DeMarinis, tenor saxophone, Mike Parkinson, trumpet, Debby Lennon, voice Matt Pickart, vioilin, Carolbeth True, piano, Willem von Hombracht, bass

and Kevin Gianino, drums
